messages: You have a vague dream of an endless barren field, shrouded in fog.
You dream of arcane runes and sigils forming and fading in rapid succession, some familiar, many unknown.
You dream of a mass grave, countless undead laid to rest for good.
You dream of a verdant forest, air thick with the scent of magical flora.
You dream of a strange hooded figure, whispering orders in a language you don't understand.
You have a dream of a portal, crumbling and collapsing.
You dream of strange imagery, of what looks like tattered cloth, fraying threads depicting an infinite host of universes.
You dream of the stars aligning, of worlds almost being shaken apart.
You have a vivid dream of walking through endless library stacks, rare and priceless grimoires all yours for the taking.
You have a strange dream of otherworldly monsters, forced to kneel before a human figure.
You have a strange dream of an exotic forest, growing over a burnt battlefield.
